summary: When a female zoology student is invited to a remote seaside mansion to assist a primatology professor with his experiments involving chimpanzees, dangerous events start to occur, all involving the intelligent 45-year-old chimp, Link.
cast: Elisabeth Shue|Terence Stamp|Steven Finch|Richard Garnett|David O'Hara|Kevin Lloyd|Joe Belcher|Daisy Beevers|Geoffrey Beevers|Jed the Chimpanzee|Caroline John|Locke the Orangutan|Linus Roache
title: Link
